transitions.pre_shoot: query.is_in_ui ? 0 : q.property('hfrlc:agility_unlock')>=15 && q.is_using_item && (temp.value = 0; temp.index = 0; loop(27, {temp.value = (query.is_item_name_any('slot.inventory', temp.index, 'minecraft:arrow') || (query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', temp.index, 'minecraft:arrow'))); temp.value ? {return temp.value;}; temp.index = temp.index+1;}););
